downloadTitle: Update for Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Service Pack 1 TFS Build Explorer (KB2522890)
downloadDescription: This update addresses a crash when trying to display build details from Team Foundation Server 2008 Build Explorer with VS2010 SP1.
detailsSection: This update addresses a crash with a NullReferenceException when trying to display build details from the Build Explorer connected to a Team Foundation Server 2008 team project with VS2010 SP1.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Architectures:
  • 32-Bit (x86)
  • 64-Bit (x64)
Hardware Requirements:
  • Computer that has a 2.2GHz or faster processor
  • 1 GB RAM for x86
  • 8 GB of available hard disk space
Prerequisites:
  • Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2010 SP1
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Change.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
